item.title: Is A Reverse Mortgage Right For You?
item.description: If you plan on remaining in your home after retirement, a reverse mortgage is another financial resource you may wish to become familiar with. Essentially, a reverse mortgage is a line of home equity that most homeowners age 62 and older are eligible for.
